resources.string: No high score entries to display

"Yeh wanna race? Yah? Read 'em rules below.

Click on "Race Now" in the main screen to start. Tap the screen, tilt yer device to control the black box. Go around each barrel once till they turn green. Return to the red pen once all barrels turn green.

Beware, do not touch them walls, or you get a penalty like them drunk drivers. Do not touch the barrel, or y'll be thrown out.

Use the settings to change yer box's speed and size of yer barrels. But hey, race as fast yeh can, lower the time you take, the better it is."
